DEVIATE.Definition: change (from the usual way of doing it)

QUALITY TIME.Definition: time spent focussing on being with someone, doing enjoyable activities

PLAY THINGS BY EAR.Definition: decide how to act in the situation as it happens, without a fixed plan

HOW THE SAUSAGE GETS MADE.Definition: the process or work behind creating it

A FAIR BIT.Definition: a large amount or quite a lot

CONDENSE.Definition: make it shorter or smaller by removing parts of it

CUSTOM.Definition: created specifically for the purpose of the episodes

METICULOUSLY.Definition: very carefully, paying attention to every detail

BEHIND THE SCENES.Definition: what happens in private, not seen by the public

BUDGET.Definition: amount of money available for spending

CORE.Definition: the central or most important part

RECURRING.Definition: happening repeatedly or over and over again

CATCH UP.Definition: move fast enough to listen to them all

OVERWHELMING.Definition: very demanding, often causing confusion or stress

BLUNTLY.Definition: directly, without trying to be careful or diplomatic

DUTY.Definition: responsibility or something I must do
